I met a man under side walk. His penis was sticking out from one of the cracks. But no! It was actually my cell phone. The dick poking out of the sidewalk was my phone. It flexed. "Your phone is ringing" a muffled voice said. I wanted to answer it but i didn't, it started ejaculating text messages on to me. I hope he didn't have aids. Ring ring! The phone flexed again. Being fed up with these shenanigans. I stuck a funnel into the uthrea of the phone and put fire ants in the funnel. I heard muffled screams. Then i  fell into a field of gang rapings and large black cocks. The end goodnight fuck u

topics.body: Anyway, 70s anime dubs were pretty strange. (Executives just considered anime was just considered to be a cheaper method of entertaining kids, So they could do whatever they wanted with it. That was probably one of the better dubs to come out of that time period.)

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558a3cbe6368727a6d000360#post_558a3cbe6368727a6d000360
[bq="uc9"]And in important news: the USA's supreme court is a little under 5 days away from ruling on gay marriage.


I was reading a interview with a famous lawyer that has debated at the supreme court 80 times and he said that more than likely in a 5-4 it will be legalized because there's 4 conservatives, 4 liberals and 1 moderate (Kennedy).

The reason why it will more than likely be legalized is that if the bans are upheld it would cause a massive court shitstorm like beyond shitstorm to the point they would have to determine whether or not the 14th amendment is legal levels shitstorm.  The reason specifically why it will be legalized is Kennedy is a moderate and looks at it a legal viewpoint; the anti-gay marriage side has no justification legally as to why the bans should be upheld and they have no justification as to justify causing essentially a constitutional crisis.

Tl:dr; gay marriage is probably going to be legalized in the usa on monday cause the anti side can't justify their arguments legally.[/bq]
_Meanwhile on Episode 200 of MLP:FiM..._
